trends.name: Oversized Graphic Tees
trends.description: Loose-fitting tees with bold graphics, logos, or vintage designs.

trends.name: Baggy Cargo Pants
trends.description: Wide-legged pants with multiple pockets, inspired by military and Y2K fashion.

trends.name: Chunky Sneakers
trends.description: Thick-soled sneakers, often in white or neutral tones, popular in both casual and runway fashion.
